Name: Imperator's Relic
AttributesDescription: A relic that Sentinel Imperator left you.
BgDescription: This relic from Sentinel Imperator has been sealed in the Earthrend Wedge, waiting silently for the destined hand. As your fingers lightly tap on its surface, a gentle wind whispers past your ear, carrying with it an unspoken tenderness from realms beyond the farthest horizon.
ObtainedShowDescription: A discoid-shaped relic that Sentinel Imperator left you. There is still no way to open it yet.
